data.title: NFT Preview Card Component
data.content: The NFT Preview card component UI was created entirely with HTML and CSS.

data.title: QR Code Component
data.content: QR code component created solely with HTML and CSS. The user interface was designed in a stylish, modern look.

data.title: MovieSpace
data.content: The MovieSpace website was built using ReactJS, which uses IMDB API to fetch using a search query using user input. reactjs and imdb api to fetch data and display results.

data.title: Portfolio
data.content: Nexts was used to create the portfolio website. TailwindCSS and Framer motion were used to style the website. Sanity is utilised as a content management system.

data.title: Estatery
data.content: Estatery is a real estate website that was built using NextJS, TailwindCSS, and Sanity. The website is fully responsive and mobile friendly.
